reference.title: DITA4Publishers Language Reference

refbodydiv.section: The language reference provides information about each element in the DITA4Publishers vocabulary modules. This is a work in progress. If there are specific aspects you would like fleshed out sooner rather than later, please email Steven Calderwood at stevenc@hkusa.com.
